name: Steam Jumper
description:
How difficult would it be to parkour in a steampunk world? Well difficult, but thankfully you have your handy steam suit to help you out! Use your steam powers to manage to parkour thorough the whole city!

Controls in the game.

50000 points to get to the city area, can you do it?
